page.title: 06POPULATION
page.content: THERE ARE 26 CHILDREN IN OUR CLASS AND THEY ALL TOOK A POPULATION SHEET HOME. ON THE 3rd OF JULY THE SHEETS WERE RETURNED AND THE RESULTS COLLECTED IN SIX GROUPS. {1 NUMBER OF PEOPLE IN THE HOUSE} THERE ARE 18 HOUSES WITH 2 PEOPLE IN, 11 HOUSES WITH 3 PEOPLE IN, 15 HOUSES WITH 4 PEOPLE IN, 5 HOUSES WITH 5 PEOPLE IN, AND FINALY 5 HOUSES WITH 7 PEOPLE IN. {2 NUMBER OF ADULTS IN THE HOUSE THERE IS 1 HOUSEHOLD WITH 1 ADULT IN, 37 HOUSEHOLDS WITH 2 ADULTS IN, AND 9 HOUSEHOLDS WITH 3 ADULTS IN. {3 NUMBER OF CHILDREN IN HOUSE THERE ARE 13 CHILDREN IN 1 CHILD FAMILIES, 15 CHILDREN IN 2 CHILD FAMILIES, 3 CHILDREN IN 3 CHILD FAMILIES AND 4 CHILDREN IN 5 CHILD FAMILIES. {
